title: Machine Learning-Based Water Meter Failure Prediction System Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic machine learning concepts, Python programming experience, and experience utilizing public data
context.additional_context: Training course for in-service professionals to enhance modeling and interpretation competencies using real data for solving public infrastructure maintenance issues

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement machine learning prediction models using labeled water meter data.
Learners can collaborate with domain experts to understand and apply data quality improvement processes.
Learners can write model validation reports that comprehensively evaluate statistical significance and predictive accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
